publicChainIdentifier.description: The public identifier of the chain

seedLength.description: The length of the seed in bytes

public_chain_identifier.description: The public identifier of the chain

post.summary: Approve a hash for a Gnosis Safe transaction

safeTxHash.description: The hash of the transaction to approve

masterKeyLabel.description: The label of the master key

derivationPath.description: The derivation path for the key

signature.description: The signature object returned by the safe

safeTxGas.description: The gas limit for the safe transaction

gasToken.description: The token used to pay for gas

refundReceiver.description: The address to receive any gas refund

post.summary: Add a signature to a Gnosis Safe transaction

to.description: The address to send the transaction to

data.description: The data to send with the transaction

operation.description: The operation type (0 for Call, 1 for DelegateCall)

safeTxGas.description: The gas limit for the transaction

baseGas.description: The base gas for the transaction

gasPrice.description: The gas price for the transaction

gasToken.description: The token to use for gas payment

refundReceiver.description: The address to receive the gas refund

post.summary: Generate a master key pair for a chain
post.description: This endpoint generates a master key pair for a chain. Each key has a corresponding key stored on the AWS KMS and the encrypted seed is stored in the database.

chainId.description: The chain id for which the master key pair is to be generated

isMasterKey.description: Flag indicating if the key is a master key

kmsType.description: The type of the KMS to be used (awsKms, localKms, cloudHsm, utimaco)

post.summary: Generate a child key from a master key
post.description: This endpoint generates a key from a master key using the provided derivation path and either a master key label or an extended public key (xPubKey).

derivationPath.description: The derivation path for the child key

masterKeyLabel.description: The label of the master key

error.description: Error message if the request failed

post.description: This endpoint signs a transaction using the provided master key label, chain name, derivation path, and transaction data.

masterKeyLabel.description: The label of the master key

derivationPath.description: The derivation path for the key

transaction.description: The transaction data to be signed

signature.description: The generated transaction with the signature

error.example: Error signing data: Invalid child index

post.description: This endpoint signs a hash using the provided master key label, chain name, derivation path, and hash data.

masterKeyLabel.description: The label of the master key

derivationPath.description: The derivation path for the key

error.example: Error signing data: Invalid child index

tags.name: Chain Service
tags.description: Endpoints related to blockchain chain services onboarding and update.

tags.name: Gnosis Service
tags.description: Endpoints related to Gnosis services, including execTransaction, and signature payload generation.

tags.name: Key Service
tags.description: Endpoints related to key management services, including generating child keys from master seed.

tags.name: Transaction Service
tags.description: Endpoints related to transaction services, generic signing for chains using EIP155.
